parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the marker shape. See [[setMarkerShape]] for a list of strings that can be returned. Possible return values:
* <tt>"ICON"</tt>
* <tt>"RECTANGLE"</tt>
* <tt>"ELLIPSE"</tt>
* <tt>"POLYLINE"</tt>
* <tt>"ERROR"</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''markerShape''' name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[String]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ('''markerShape''' "Marker1" == "RECTANGLE") [[then]] {[[hint]] "Marker1 is a rectangle!"}</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerShape]], [[setMarkerShapeLocal]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
